lecture.speech: Well, do you get used to making music?
That's good! This time, I'll teach you how to change the musical instrument so that you can express something better.
Oh, I can change the musical instrument? That sounds fun! Then, I can see the button which has piano picture.
Yes. If you click the button, you can see a list of musical instruments.
You can play the music with the musical instrument which you chose.
♪...I played the music with changing musical instrument. It sounds quite difficult because I changed the musical instrument!
That's right! So, let's choose the musical instrument which suits to something you want to express!
